Anyway.
I suggest a way for now is to make a little encoder

```
strings 
u_strings = unique(strings)
x = findfirst.(Ref(u_strings), strings)
```
That should be pretty fast if you don't have more than a few dozen categories.
Beyond that you'll want a `Dict`
